name: Speeder Race
description:
A Star Wars Fan Game

Take part in exciting races across different planets of the galaxy and defeat your friends! Speeder Race offers fantastic graphics, tight turns and exciting duels.

Are you ready for your Star Wars adventure?

For more technical information and videos, click here

Newest trailer: here

Modes
  • Time Trial
  • Local Multiplayer
Features
  • 3 different Maps to race on
  • Many Clone Trooper Designs
  • Boost and Drift through the Roads
  • Stunning Graphics
  • Shoot your Rivals
Installation
  1. Download the ZIP archive from itch.io
  2. Unzip it to a local directory
  3. Run “Speeder Race.exe”
Technology
  • Unity
  • Blender
  • Adobe Photoshop
Developers

Phil and Felix

Art and Models

Phil

Credits

This project was developed as part of the Game Development module at the Anhalt University of Applied Sciences.
